Description: A conical jar-seal: of pale brown clay, bearing an impressed inscription which shows the repeated name of Den. The surface of the clay is in poor condition.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: W. M. F. Petrie, 'Royal Tombs of the Earliest Dynasties' I, pl.XXIV, 44; W. M. F. Petrie, 'Royal Tombs of the Earliest Dynasties' II, pl. XVIII, 137 P. Kaplony, 'Die Inschriften der Ägyptischen Frühzeit III (Wiesbaden, 1964), pls.55, abb.202D; 56, abb. 204; see also vol. II, 1119.
